price: and were witnessing what they did to the believers[2].
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ
footnotes: [2] After the believers were casted into a trench of fire, they sat around it watching them burn to death. It occurred long before Prophet Muhammad's (ﷺ) time.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
